features.card2_text1: No need to carry your own power bank.
features.card2_text2_line1: We are always ready to support you everywhere –
features.card2_text2_line2: from coffee shops to shopping malls.

why_choose.title: CONVENIENT ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
why_choose.description_line1: Sac Luon is a smart power bank rental network,
why_choose.description_line2: helping you stay connected without interruption.
why_choose.description_line3: Just scan the QR code, take the charger, and return it anywhere.
why_choose.feature2: Smart charging stations widely covered across Vietnam
why_choose.feature3: Flexible payment via e-wallets or bank cards

how_to_use.subtitle: OPERATING PROCESS
how_to_use.title: EASY TO USE
how_to_use.step1_desc: Open the Sac Luon app or scan the QR code to locate charging stations around you.
how_to_use.step2_title: SCAN AND GET THE POWER BANK
how_to_use.step2_desc: Scan the QR code on the station, and the power bank automatically pops out – ready to use immediately.
how_to_use.step3_desc: Return the power bank at any station in the system. The system automatically records the return and processes payment.

easy_to_use.subtitle: EASY TO USE
easy_to_use.title: FAST REFUNDS
easy_to_use.step1_desc: Please open your banking or e-wallet app to get started
easy_to_use.step2_desc: Scan the code to pay the battery rental deposit and start using
easy_to_use.step3_desc: Return the battery and get your rental deposit back in just 1-2 minutes

outstanding_features.subtitle: Outstanding Features
outstanding_features.feature1_desc: quick battery charge in just 30 minutes.
outstanding_features.feature2_desc: compatible with all charging standards: iPhone, Android, Type-C, etc.
outstanding_features.feature3_desc: pick up and return the power bank at any station in the system.
outstanding_features.feature4_desc: transparent transaction tracking, power banks undergo regular inspection.

core_values.subtitle: CORE VALUES
core_values.value_point1: We believe that the power bank is not just an energy source, but also a bridge that helps people stay connected to the world.
core_values.value_point2_line1: Sac Luon aims to create a smart, friendly, and sustainable energy ecosystem –
core_values.value_point2_line2: so that every moment of yours is always powered up.

customer_stories.subtitle: Customer Stories
customer_stories.content_line2: We are proud to accompany you on every journey.
customer_stories.question_return_full: What should I do if the charging station I arrive at for returning the power bank is already full?
customer_stories.question_how_to_return: How do I return the power bank?
customer_stories.question_station_empty: What should I do if the charging station has no power banks available?

about_us.title: ABOUT US
about_us.bullet_1: We believe technology should serve life in an accessible and flexible way.
about_us.bullet_2: Sac Luon is not just about power bank rental – it offers a smart energy experience, helping people connect, share, and live more actively every day.

vision.title: VISION
vision.bullet_1: Sac Luon is a smart power bank rental brand – ensuring you are always fully charged, anytime, anywhere.
vision.bullet_2: Born from a simple yet essential need in modern life: “What happens when the battery dies?”.
vision.bullet_3: We provide a convenient, fast, and friendly solution, keeping you connected without interruption – whether you're studying, working, or travelling.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.bullet_1: Keep energy ready for everyone, every moment.
mission.bullet_2: We believe technology should serve life in an accessible and flexible way.
mission.bullet_3: Sac Luon is not just about power bank rental – it offers a smart energy experience, helping people connect, share, and live more actively every day.

items.question: What is Sac Luon?
items.answer: Sac Luon is an on-site portable charger rental service. You only need to scan the QR code at the stations, rent the power bank immediately, and return it to any other station when finished. The service operates 24/7.

items.question: Where can I rent a power bank?
items.answer: There are currently over 5,000 stations in Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi, Da Nang, Can Tho,... located at Vincom, Lotte, Circle K, GS25, Highlands, The Coffee House, pubs, karaoke, airports, bus stations... Open the Sac Luon app to find the nearest station.

items.question: How to rent and return the power bank?
items.answer:
Step 1: Download the Sac Luon app or scan the QR code at the station
Step 2: Select the power bank + Deposit the rental fee shown on the app screen via payment channels like Momo, ZaloPay, bank cards...
Step 3: The charging slot automatically pops out the power bank + Take it for use
Step 4: Insert the power bank into any empty slot at another station + The app automatically ends the rental session and refunds the deposit (minus the rental fee)

items.question: What is the rental price?
items.answer:
10,000 mAh Power Bank: from 10,000đ – 25,000đ/day
20,000 mAh Power Bank (PD 20W fast charging): from 15,000đ – 35,000đ/day
Calculated based on actual usage hours, with a maximum limit not exceeding the daily cap.

items.question: What is the fee calculation if used for more than 24 hours?
items.answer: Each subsequent 24 hours costs an additional 50–70% of the initial daily price (depending on the power bank type). The longer you use it, the cheaper it gets, up to a maximum of 7 days when the billing automatically stops.

items.question: Are the power banks clean and fully charged?
items.answer:
1. If the power bank is not returned within 7 days, the system will automatically charge a buyout fee:
* 10,000 mAh Power Bank: 450,000đ
* 20,000 mAh Power Bank: 650,000đ (this already includes the previous rental fee).

items.question: Is fast charging and multi-port support available?
items.answer: The 20,000 mAh Power Bank supports PD 20W + QC 3.0 fast charging, and comes with 3 built-in cables: Lightning, Type-C, Micro USB.
